definition: to deceive/to cheat/to hoodwink/to make a wild guess
Mongol ethnic group/abbr. for Mongolia 蒙古國|蒙古国[Meng3 gu3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Meng2]
to cover/ignorant/to suffer (misfortune)/to receive (a favor)/to cheat
to turn (a corner etc)/to kidnap/to swindle/to misappropriate/walking stick/crutch/seven (used as a substitute for 七[qi1])
to cheat/to swindle/to deceive/to get on (a horse etc) by swinging one leg over

sentences.english: Oppose cheating and dishonesty at all time.

definition: to imitate the dog and steal chicken (idiom)/to pilfer/to dally with women/to have affairs
lit. devil's gate, crooked path (idiom); corrupt practices/crooked methods/dishonesty
to seek nothing but profit (idiom); personal profit before everything/self-seeking
to fool the world and usurp a good name (idiom)
speculation and profiteering (idiom); buying and selling on speculation
to kill and burn (idiom); murder and arson
to see profit and forget morality (idiom); to act from mercenary considerations/to sell one's soul for gain
